name: Futile Coda
description:
Survive for as long as you can against the endless waves of enemies with your own choice of weapon.

Inspired by Gears of War's horde mode combined with old-school pseudo-3D graphics.

Keyboard/mouse and Gamepads supported.

Credits:

Ben Wilson (Design, Code, A/V, Sound) - http://www.zerofifty.one
Daniel Cohen (Design, Code, 3D Models) - https://twitter.com/faemir
Matt Blickem (Design, Code) - https://twitter.com/mattblickem
Kathryn Zalecka (Concept Art, Environment Art, 2D Art) - http://kathrynzalecka.com
David Read (Design, Code)

Made for a game jam in April 2014

Code: https://github.com/explosivose/FutileCoda
